subject: Re: MDNSW website support
preview: Hi Joel,  It all seems to be working as it should now.  Huge thanks!  Maddy  Madalyn Busby Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW  P: (02) 8986 9014 E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

It all seems to be working as it should now.

Huge thanks!

Maddy

Madalyn Busby
Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW

P: (02) 8986 9014
E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn,

Yes, that should fix it soon and we have cleared the site and server cache, can you try now? Or you can check it in incognito mode?

Hi Joel,

Many thanks for your quick reply.

It seems to be redirecting to our existing website. Should that fix itself soon?

Many thanks,

Maddy

Madalyn Busby
Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW

P: (02) 8986 9014
E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn,

I hope all is well.

It should be working correctly now. I have cleared the site cache.
https://mdnsw.wolfiq.cloud/

Hello Joel,

Apologies for the quiet from my end for a few weeks. My colleague finished up with MDNSW a few weeks ago, so things have been incredibly busy as I manage multiple competing projects.

I have been making updates to the website and populating content. However, the link I've been using is no longer working and I can't access the backend. Can you please let me know what's happening here?

Many thanks,

Maddy

Madalyn Busby
Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW

P: (02) 8986 9014
E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn,

Thanks Madalyn,

  • Wishing you luck 🙂
  • Regarding Contact form - Salesforce, If you can send the code from salesforce form that would be great. At the moment I don't have access to the current live site.
  • If you could send us a screen record that would be very helpful.

Thanks Joel, that looks great now 😊 As a heads up of where we're up to for this project:
  • Today I will be presenting the website as it stands to our internal team - so some feedback could come from that. After that, we will get community feedback.
  • We need to integrate the contact form with Salesforce like on our existing website. Can I confirm this hasn't already been set up? Can you see any code or functionality on the existing website that indicates how it was set up? We also need to integrate our membership form.
  • It looks like some of the website might need further optimising for mobile e.g. the "how can we help" functionality, the Latest News page etc. Also not sure if we can change the focal point for the header images on mobile? I can do a full mobile review if that would be helpful.
I'm still hoping we're tracking to launch at the end of the month, but we will see how we go. Many thanks, Maddy Madalyn Busby Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW P: (02) 8986 9014 E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn,

We have updated the dropdown, It seems to be isolated only for microsoft edge. Can you try again?

Hi Joel,

That's great, thank you.

I'm using Microsoft Edge, though I just tested and it's the same on Chrome. I'm on Windows.

Many thanks,

Maddy

Madalyn Busby
Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW

P: (02) 8986 9014
E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn,

I hope you had a great weekend.

We have adjusted the site.
  • Pages are now included to "Topics" and you are now able to assign pages to the taxonomy
  • Regarding the dropdown color. What browser are you using? and OS Windows or Mac?

Hi Joel, Apologies for the late response. Thanks for sharing this - it's looking good. A few quick things at this stage:
  • See screenshot below - the text is white in the drop down until you hover over it. Can this be fixed?
  • Is it possible for pages - not just posts - to have a topic assigned to them? Pages are where the most relevant pieces of content will be found for this functionality.
Many thanks, Maddy Madalyn Busby Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW P: (02) 8986 9014 E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn,

We have made updates to site.

The post list are here.
https://mdnsw.wolfiq.cloud/wp-admin/edit.php

Here is the link for the topis.
https://mdnsw.wolfiq.cloud/wp-admin/edit-tags.php?taxonomy=topic

Here is the landing page.
https://mdnsw.wolfiq.cloud/recommendation/

Hi Madalyn,

Thanks for sending the structure,

We will work on these and update you asap.

Hi Joel, That's great. In that case, here's my structure as it currently stands. I'm a
  • Young person
  • Parent or carer
  • Adult
  • Health professional
  • Donor
I'm looking for
  • Information and resources
  • Support
  • Stories
About
  • Neuromuscular conditions
  • Neuromuscular clinics
  • Services
  • The NDIS
  • Events
  • How I can get involved
Many thanks, Maddy Madalyn Busby Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW P: (02) 8986 9014 E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn,

Yes, you will be able to add edit and delete the list in the future.

This is a sample structure that I am using:

Type of person:
-a young person
-an old person

I’m looking for:
-information
-assistance
-downloads

About:
-mental health
-support
-Muscular Dystrophy

Hi Joel,

I have started working on the list of categories but before I send them through, I wanted to check if we'd be able to change these in future?

Next week I'll be presenting the website (as it stands - so not final) to our internal team for feedback. So there could be suggestions for this functionality. Would we be able to change it ourselves? Or should I workshop this with our team and then send the final categories through?

Many thanks,

Maddy

Madalyn Busby
Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW

P: (02) 8986 9014
E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn,

I hope all is well.

We are currently working on "Show me my recommendation". Can you send us a list of categories? this will help us structure the urls and the flow of the form.

Hi Madalyn,

We found a glitch with the query. we have updated it now and it should be working correctly.
https://mdnsw.wolfiq.cloud/service/camps-and-retreats/

Hi Joel,

That's great news!

On another note, I have started uploading testimonials and they don't appear to be showing up. I uploaded two testimonials, with "Camps & Retreats" set as the category. I then went into the "Camps & Retreats" page itself too to select that category. However, they're not showing up. Am I doing something wrong?

Many thanks,

Maddy

Madalyn Busby
Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW

P: (02) 8986 9014
E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au

Hi Madalyn.

Thanks for sending the code. We have updated donate page. "Authorization Required" is needed, I think this will be fixed when we go live.

https://mdnsw.wolfiq.cloud/donate/

Hi Joe,

The testimonial functionality looks great. I'll begin uploading that content and let you know if I have any issues.

I have also attached some new code for the donation form for you. Fingers crossed this may work!

Many thanks,

Maddt

Madalyn Busby
Marketing and Engagement Team Lead | Muscular Dystrophy NSW

P: (02) 8986 9014
E: madalyn.busby@mdnsw.org.au
